name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 30, Linyi, Shandong. A loan officer in Zhujiaxu Village secretly transferred hundreds of depositors' deposits of more than 60 million yuan to Zhengtong Group.
In April, depositors came to withdraw their money one after another, but the loan officer told them that there was no money and the depositors' money could not be withdrawn. On the same day, the depositors went to the Lanshan Branch of the Linyi Public Security Bureau to report the case, and more than 200 households signed the joint letter, but the police refused to file a case.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
April 30, Shanghai Hongqiao. The owner of a new building of China Merchants Real Estate was found to have illegally used flammable materials as insulation materials. The owner asked the government to intervene in the inspection, but the government department refused to do so.
A fierce conflict occurred during the negotiation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"The big one is coming"
Two recent major events that have not caused discussion:
Minister of National Security Chen Yixin said that the "Five Antis" campaign should be carried out in depth
The Central Cyberspace Affairs Commission emphasized the need to focus on building a "big report" pattern.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In the early morning of May 1, Meizhou, Guangdong. A road collapse occurred at K11+900m on the Meilong Expressway (Meida section) heading towards Fujian. At the time of the accident, some vehicles fell off the expressway and caught fire, and the fallen vehicles were severely burned.
According to official reports, as of 11:45 on May 1, 2024, the accident caused a total of 18 vehicles to fall, involving a total of 49 people, of which 19 were confirmed dead, and 30 were being treated in the hospital with all their strength, and their lives were not in danger for the time being.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/KliunHiQrj

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 30, a lawyer in Shanghai posted a video saying that he and his team were doing a complaint visit on a case in Suqian City, Jiangsu Province. When they went to a local printing shop to print relevant materials, they were told by the shop owner that they could not print them because the materials involved accusations.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
6.5 million migrant workers left the construction industry
Caixin reported on April 30 that even after the epidemic, more and more migrant workers would rather find jobs "at home" than travel thousands of miles to the Yangtze River Delta and the Pearl River Delta to "enter the factory." With the sluggish property market, the number of workers in the construction industry has decreased significantly, and more migrant workers have flowed to the service industry in big cities.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 30, a netizen uploaded a video that attracted attention and discussion. In the video, the woman claimed to be a grassroots worker in the Shanghai tax system. Her grandfather and father were both part of a tax family. Influenced by the strong tax atmosphere, she intended to pass on the tax legacy from generation to generation in the family.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On April 29, a netizen posted a video saying that on a domestic flight from Shenzhen to Chongqing, the advertisement posters on the seat backs and luggage racks in the cabin had the Japanese words most prominently placed in the first row, and the Chinese words very small and placed below the Japanese words.
This sparked anger and accusations from netizens.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
May 1, Shanghai. A rider from "Xiaoxiang Supermarket" posted a video saying that they were kicked out of the dormitory by the stationmaster on the rainy night of May 1, Labor Day.
The rider sighed, "Is this the happiness of the working people?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
After the Meizhou Expressway landslide, a woman posted on Douyin asking for help and looking for her relatives.
The comments were cleared first, and then even the video disappeared

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/oU04aKOOs9

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 30, the Zhongliang Guobin Mansion in Enshi, Hubei Province was left unfinished, and a fierce scuffle broke out at the scene when the owners were defending their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 1, a man randomly smashed cars on the street on Shitong Road in Shijiazhuang and was later subdued by special police who arrived.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Zhongshan, Guangdong, a man went to the factory to ask for his salary after working a day. The factory passed the buck to the intermediary, and the man jumped onto the assembly line workbench to protest.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 1, a large-scale protest broke out in Changling Town, Suizhou City, Hubei Province. Thousands of people took to the streets that day to protest against the local government's forced promotion of cremation and purchase of cemeteries, which aroused dissatisfaction among local people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The main contradiction is that the locals believe that Guangshui Hilly Area is located in a mountainous area and can be buried in any corner, and the local custom is burial. They believe that the government's promotion of cremation and purchase of cemeteries is to collect money, which has caused public dissatisfaction.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some people also went to National Highway 316 to block the road.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 30, Taiyuan, Shanxi. Workers demanded their wages at Wuyue Plaza.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 30, in Qingdao, Shandong, Jinrong Excellence collapsed. The company was filed by the local police for suspected illegal fund-raising, and investors could not get their money back after their bonds matured. After the victims failed to seek redress at the Qingdao Petition Bureau, they went to the municipal government to seek redress.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: April 30, Inner Mongolia. Yili Qixing Lake Desert Ecological Tourism Zone owed workers wages, and workers held banners in the company to protest their rights. An uncle said that he had worked in the company for five years and was owed 120,000 yuan in wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On April 30, it was reported online that an employee of Ideal Auto was severely punished for participating in a discussion on the Wenjie M7 incident on WeChat Moments. Ideal Auto stated that the situation was true and gave the employee a red line demerit, notified all employees, had the employee's file recorded by human resources, deducted 100% of the performance for that month, and demoted and reduced his salary. The store manager assumed joint management responsibility and was criticized and notified to all employees.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
After the probation period, 14 employees of state-owned enterprises who were recruited from the society were collectively dismissed.
On May 1, a netizen posted a video saying that he applied for the state-owned enterprise Fushun Cultural Tourism Group last year and signed a labor contract on February 1 this year. He thought that the three-month probation period would go smoothly, but on April 26, he and more than a dozen other employees were suddenly interviewed by the human resources department and forced to sign the "Termination of Labor Contract" on the grounds of high liquidated damages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Local netizens added: "In fact, cremation has been promoted for many years. For so many years, half burial and half cremation were carried out in cemeteries. This time it seems to be forced. The cemetery costs 70,000 yuan per person (there is a preferential policy, half price for the first 100 people), and there are annual management fees. Netizens may not have a clear idea of what I said. I would like to add that in Changling Town, ordinary rental houses can be rented for about 2,000 yuan a year, and buying a house of about 100 square meters is less than 100,000 yuan."
